definition: an aimless amble on a winding course, move about aimlessly or without any destination, often in search of food or employment
details:
noun
- an aimless amble on a winding course
= synonyms: meander
verb
- move about aimlessly or without any destination, often in search of food or employment
= synonyms: cast
- continue talking or writing in a desultory manner
= example: continue talking or writing in a desultory manner
= synonyms: jog, ramble on
